attributes.action: insist the relavant authority enforce the law and stop unlicensed collectors collecting clothing from door to door and charity shops".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: unlicensed collectors are duping housholds into donating goods directly to them by distributing door to door leaflets also unlicensed collectors are offering to buy unsold clothing from charity shops this is all in the black economy and the income from this goes abroad Uk genuine ragmerchants are closing down because of the actions of these people and the loss to the charity sector runs into the millions of pounds
